amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete provisions mandating specified levels of timber salvage sales on Federal lands in fiscal years 1995 and 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill to mandate specific levels of timber salvage within the federal forests for fiscal years 1995 and 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yates amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 275, 1 Present (Roll no. 240).
